data.name: Negotiating Uncertainties with  Technology Solutions
data.summary:
The webinar will focus on how AWS along with its partners can support the State Government and its various departments to solve these challenges with dependable  solutions, cost management and optimisation services, and the backing of quick auto-scaling infrastructure to meet demand.

-Potential savings in terms of time, manpower and other resources by migrating GovTech and government operations to the cloud
-How GovTech startups can use the power of AWS Cloud to scale infrastructure to handle peaks in demand caused by extraordinary circumstances (accidents, natural disasters etc...)
-How to get leaner with resources and pricing optimisation tools, and ensure lower costs with better planning through budgeting, forecasting, and interactive cost visualisation tools
-How advanced analytics tools can be used to rapidly and effectively gather deep and relevant insights from large quantities of data
